AUX_SOURCE_DIRECTORY(./libAACdec/src aacdec_src)

                    "./libAACenc/include"
                    "./libPCMutils/include"
                    "./libFDK/include"
                    "./libSYS/include"
                    "./libMpegTPDec/include"
                    "./libMpegTPEnc/include"
                    "./libSBRdec/include"
                    "./libSBRenc/include"
                    )

            ${pcmuitls_src}

            ${sys_src}

            ${mpegtpenc_src}
            ${sbrdec_src}
            ${sbrenc_src}
           )
